content: zickzack dishcloth by stacey winklepleck finished measurements needles 9 x 8 us 7 4 5mm straight or circular yarn notions knit picks dishie 100% cotton 190 yarn needle yards/100g fiesta red 25786 1 ball gauge 5 sts = 1 in garter stitch for pattern support contact customerservice@knitpicks com zickzack dishcloth notes textured stiches always make great dishcloths - the bumps make it easy to get a good scrub on those dirty dishes this pattern features an easy to memorize zigzag zickzack in german that is repeated through the pattern and is fun to watch the design move across your dishcloth as you knit it the first 5 and last 5 stitches in each row will be in garter knit on both rs & ws for the border directions co 40 st k 6 row zigzag stitch pattern row 1 rs k5 *k3 p2 k1* repeat between ** to last 5 sts k5 row 2 ws k5 *p2 k2 p2* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 row 3 k5 *k1 p2 k3* repeat between ** to last 5 sts k5 row 4 k5 *p4 k2* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 row 5 k5 *k1 p2 k3* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 row 6 k5 *p2 k2 p2* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 row 7 k5 *k3 p2 k1* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 row 8 k5 *k2 p4* repeat from ** to last 5 sts k5 repeat zigzag stitch pattern 4 more times k 6 row bobble all stitches finishing weave in ends block if desired zigzag stitch chart 6 5 4 3 2 1 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 abbreviations bobble bind off legend co cast on knit rs knit stitch k knit ws purl stitch p purl repeat repeat purl rs purl stitch rs right side ws knit stitch st s stitches border stitches ws wrong side pattern repeat pattern repeat 22 zziicckkzzaacckk ddiisshhccllootthh
